price: 53. Ir iš tiesų, Mes davėme Mūsai (Mozei) vedimą, ir Mes privertėme Israelio (Izraelio) Vaikus paveldėti Raštą [t. y. Tauratą (Torą)]
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-hudā wa-awrathnā banī is'rāīla al-kitāba
